column5: Somehow I lost a section of my templefork nxt 9 ft 4 pc 8/9 wt rod and can't find anyone who will sell a replacement section. If anyone knows of a place shere you can buy sections it would be greatly appreciated. Thanks, RHF.
Send These guys an email or give them a call and I'm sure they will help you out.
TFO have great customer service.. Give them a ring, I'm sure they will help you out.
